Package org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog.setting.columnfilter

Class ColumnFilter

java.lang.Object
org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog.setting.columnfilter.ColumnFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
PersistableSettings
public class ColumnFilter extends Object implements PersistableSettings
A class used to store several representation of column choices. I.e. the columns can be determined using one of the modes of ColumnFilterMode.
Author:
Paul BÃ¤rnreuther
